description:
Jojo and the others land in Egypt where DIO awaits, and are currently cutting through the desert, when a helicopter approaches them. The helicopter belonged to the Speedwagon Foundation that had been helping them on their journey so far, and brought them something that Joseph had asked for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "The Fool" no Iggy to "Geb-shin" no N`doul: Sono 1
Głupiec Iggy i N`doul Geba: część 1
Iggy the Fool and Geb`s N`doul, Part 1
「愚者[ザ・フール]」のイギーと「ゲブ神」のンドゥール その1
